Class HomeViewModel

java.lang.Object
viewModel.ViewModel
viewModel.HomeViewModel
public class HomeViewModel extends ViewModel
ViewModel for HomeViewController class.

    • createFolder

      public boolean createFolder()
      method to create a new folder. sets ViewState variables to the appropriate values to store information when swapping screens
      Returns:
      boolean that is true in all cases

    • removeFolder

      public boolean removeFolder(int folderId)
      method that requests to remove a folder from the user's profile. the appropriate values in viewstate are set, and an attempt is made to remove the folder, returning a boolean upon success/failure
      Parameters:
      folderId - integer to represent the folder ID
      Returns:
      boolean to represent success/failure of the request

    • editFolder

      public void editFolder(String title, int id)
      method that prepares the viewstate in order to edit a user's folder
      Parameters:
      title - String for the title of the folder
      id - integer for the folder's ID
